text: pumiyil natamatit(tam valkkait tevaikalai niraiverra) etuvum ceyya mutiyata alavukku allahvin pataiyil tankalai arppanittuk kontavarkalukkut tan (unkalutaiya tana tarmankal) uriyavaiyakum. (Piraritam yacikkata) avarkalutaiya penutalaik kantu, ariyatavan avarkalaic celvantarkal enru ennik kolkiran;. Avarkalutaiya ataiyalankalal avarkalai nir arintu kollalam. Avarkal manitarkalitam varunti etaiyum ketkamattarkal; (ittakaiyorukkaka) nallatininru ninkal etaic celavu ceytalum, atai niccayamaka allah nankarivan
